title.english: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

description:
Junichi Hashiba is nearing the end of high school and going into panic mode. His time here has not gone as expected: he has no girlfriend and worse yet—he’s still a virgin! Desperate to experience the big ‘first,’ his friends pressure him to approach the gyaru—a fashionable and boy-crazy gal—Yukana Yame for a good time. But his first mistake was thinking this gal would be an easy one!

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: แฟนผมเป็นสาวแกล

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

title.native: はじめてのギャル はじめての文化祭

node.description: Website | Blog | Portfolio | Anison __Kouta Kobayashi__, commonly known as Yashikin, is a Japanese lyricist, composer and orechestrator. He was born in Toshima-ku, Tokyo, Japan, and brought up in Ikebukuro. He is affiliated with F.M.F.

__[Website](http://afiliasaga.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/junjo_no_afilia)__ | __[Blog (Line)](https://lineblog.me/afiliasaga/)__

__Formed:__ November 22, 2008 (under the name Afilia Saga East)
__Activity:__ 2008–2013 (as Afilia Saga East), 2013–2017 (as Afilia Saga), 2017– (as Junjou no Afilia)

__Introduction:__
Junjou no Afilia, alternatively known as Junjou no Akita, previously known as Afilia Saga East and Afilia Saga, is a Japanese female idol group formed through the Afilia Saga Maid Café-chain.

__Biography:__
Beginning as a unit back in 2008, the group is considered as a "academy-type vocal unit" consisting of girls selected from establishments that belong to the Afilia Group, which is a nationwide cafe and restaurant network. The group uses a line-up changing system with members who join and leave, while being jointly produced by two people: Chiyomaru Shikura and voice actress and singer Haruko Momoi.

In 2012, on March 28, Afilia Saga East (which it was known as at the time), released their 7th single titled "Mirai no Watashi o Matteiru". The title song was written by Tsunku and composed by Chiyomaru Shikura. At the time, the group consisted of 14 members, this is the largest the group has ever been since its creation in 2008. The single became the group's first entry in the Oricon Weekly Charts, reaching the top 10.

A year later in 2013, during March 24, the group consisted of 11 members. Later in July of the same year, after rebranding from Afilia Saga East to the name Afilia Saga, they were tasked to perform the ending theme to the TV anime _[Hyperdimenstion Neptunia: The Animation](https://anilist.co/anime/16157/Choujigen-Game-Neptune-The-Animation/)_, as well as the opening theme for a different anime release, _[My Mental Choices are Completely Interfering with my School Romantic Comedy](https://anilist.co/anime/19221/Ore-no-Nounai-Sentakushi-ga-Gakuen-Love-Comedy-wo-Zenryoku-de-Jama-Shiteiru/)_.

On June 3, 2017, they would rebrand once again from Afilia Saga to their current name Junjou no Afilia.

__Members:__
- Kaori Nagisa (渚カオリ) – vocalist (member color: green)
- Kana Hayama (葉山カナ) – vocalist (member color: yellow)
- Yumi Terasaka (寺坂ユミ) – vocalist (member color: turquoise)
- Anna Oda (桜田アンナ) – vocalist (member color: orange)

- Meimi Mochidzuki (望月ミイミ) – vocalist (member color: crimson)

__Former Members:__

Active since: February 17, 2016 [Website](http://leido.co.jp/erabareshi) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_erabareshi_) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/39824.html) | [Wiki](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%A8%E3%83%A9%E3%83%90%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B7) An eight-member idol group that originated in Akihabara. (Source: MAL)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chiyomaru5pb)__ | __[Company Profile (MAGES)](http://mages.co.jp/about/company/)__

__Chiyomaru Shikura__ is a Japanese guitarist, novelist, voice actor, radio personality, moderator, animation planner, animation supervisor, music producer, composer, arranger and the representative director of 5pb./MAGES. 

Chiyomaru resigns as chairman and representative director of MAGES. on January 4th, 2023.

He has been the producer and lead animation planner for titles such as Chaos;Head, Steins;Gate, and Robotics;Notes. Shikura is also a very active composer and lyricist. To date, he has written over a hundred theme songs for the video games and anime adaptations he's worked on.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

__[Profile (T&E Corporation)](http://www.tande-co.com/?p=858)__

__Shun Itou__, alternatively known by alias Shinichi Yuuki, is a Japanese guitarist composer and arranger.
